home.title: Discover Amazing
home.description: Browse through thousands of products, save your favorites, and explore detailed information. Built with Angular and Firebase for a seamless shopping experience.
home.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need for a great shopping experience
home.featureSearchDesc: Powerful server-side search with real-time filtering and debounced queries for instant results.
home.featureFavoritesDesc: Keep track of your favorite items. Syncs across devices when you're logged in.
home.featurePWADesc: Works offline, installs on your device, and provides a native app-like experience.
home.featureAuthDesc: Firebase Authentication with email validation and strong password requirements.
home.featureInfoDesc: Comprehensive product details with images, ratings, prices, and specifications.
home.featureFastDesc: Optimized performance with lazy loading, pagination, and efficient data caching.
home.ctaDescription: Browse our extensive catalog and discover products that match your needs.

about.title: About ItemsCatalog
about.subtitle: A modern, full-featured e-commerce platform built with cutting-edge web technologies
about.missionText1: ItemsCatalog is designed to provide users with a seamless shopping experience. We combine powerful search capabilities, intuitive user interfaces, and modern web technologies to create a platform that's both beautiful and functional.
about.missionText2: Whether you're browsing products, saving favorites, or managing your profile, every feature is built with user experience in mind.
about.userFocusedDesc: Every feature designed with users in mind
about.feature1: Advanced Search: Server-side search with real-time filtering and debounced queries
about.feature2: Favorites System: Save items locally or sync across devices with Firebase
about.feature3: User Authentication: Secure login with Firebase Auth and profile management
about.feature4: Progressive Web App: Installable, works offline, and provides native app experience
about.feature5: Responsive Design: Beautiful UI that works on all devices
about.feature6: Image Compression: Web Worker-based image processing for profile pictures
about.readyDesc: Start browsing our catalog and discover amazing products
